title: Matt Bishop: Sparks fly when genius meets brilliance at the Hungarian GP
summary: Hungary has hosted thrilling duels between Tazio Nuvolari and Bernd Rosemeyer; between Ayrton Senna and Nelson Piquet. Will 2025 bring another battle between Formula 1's brightest talents? asksMatt Bishop

qa_pairs.question: Which two legendary drivers had memorable duels in Hungary during their careers?
What year is speculated to potentially feature exciting battles among Formula 1's top talents?
Who was involved in historic races against Tazio Nuvolari in Hungary?
